span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;

    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {
    background: #f1f3f2;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg a {
    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;

    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;

    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/inc.jpg) no-repeat left;
}

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {

}
.pkg-exc ul li {

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Hong Kong Macau Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/hongkong-tour-packages" title="Hong Kong Tour Packages">Hong Kong</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Hong Kong Macau Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c31a0df4356_34634140" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/hong-kong-macau.jpg" alt="Hong Kong Macau Tour Package" title="Hong Kong Macau Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>A single tour to witness the mesmerizing and incredible charm of two beautiful countries of the world Hong Kong and Macau. Hong Kong Macau Tour Package plays a vital role in exploring the incredible wonders of these destinations. Hong Kong is the destination where you can make your kids discover the wonders of Disneyland and is also the city where you can find a huge number of skyscrapers enthralling and making you feel amazed. Next comes the wonderful city of Macau which is reckoned for its popular sights of the wonders in the city and makes it one of the most memorable journeys of your life.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Hong Kong Macau Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Mumbai – Hong Kong</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Upon your arrival at the Chhatrapati Shivaji Airport in Mumbai, you will be accompanied by the other group members of the trip and our tour representative. Board the flight to Hong Kong and once you land at the airport you will be taken to one of your pre-decided hotels where you will be served with the delicious meals. On the very first day of your trip, you will be on a short city sightseeing tour in the city including the sky terrace 428, the panoramic views of Hong Kong Island, Harbour Tunnel, Kowloon Peninsula, and the symbol of Madame Tussauds Wax Museum. Also, you will get the opportunity to explore Victoria Harbour via Star Ferry and also witness the mesmerizing views of the entire city from the Clock Tower. When it gets dark you can visit the spectacular light and sound show followed by a relaxing night halt.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Hong Kong</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>The 2nd day of your Hong Kong Macau tour is scheduled to visit Disneyland in Hong Kong which lets you attain entertainment, excitement, and complete fun. Go for the enjoying toy story land where you can participate in the Disney show at the Fantasy Land and also to the Tomorrow Land where you can fly your own spaceship. Then go to the Adventure Land where you can enjoy the jungle boat ride and then stroll down the streets where you can enjoy the ride of old-fashioned vehicles in the USA.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Hong Kong – Macau</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Take the ride of Jet Foil to reach Macau where you can cover some of the popular destinations like Wine Museum or Macau Museum, Grand Prix Museum. Later half of your city orientation tour covers Penha Hill, Statue of Goddess of Mercy, Barrier Gate, St. Paul Cathedral, and then the Observatory Deck of the Macau Tower from where you get to explore the charm of the entire city.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Macau – Hong Kong and then Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>As the journey concludes today so you will be taken to Hong Kong by the same transport you opted to reach here. Once you reach the airport in Hong Kong your travel companions along with our representative will bid adieu and we want you to stay in touch with us via Facebook or e-mail.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB3">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="cmsmasters-icon-flight" aria-hidden="true"></i> Trip Highlights</h3>
<ul class="highlight-this-tour">
<li>In Hong Kong start your tour with a visit to Sky Terrace 428, where you get the views of Hong Kong Island, the Harbour Tunnel, the Kowloon Peninsula, and then you proceed to the Madame Tussauds Wax Museum</li>
<li>Explore Victoria Harbour on the Star Ferry and take in the breathtaking views of the entire city from the Clock Tower</li>
<li>When it gets dark, you can even enjoy a spectacular light and sound show there</li>
<li>And adventurous visit to the Disneyland of Hong Kong</li>
<li>In Macau explore the city through the Wine Museum, Macau Museum, and Grand Prix Museum are all options.</li>
<li>Visit the Penha Hill, the Statue of the Goddess of Mercy, the Barrier Gate, St. Paul Cathedral, and the Observatory Deck of the Macau Tower, from which you can explore the entire city's charm.</li>
</ul></div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Hong Kong Macau Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Do Tourists Flock To Macau?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> When you visit Macau, a former Portuguese colony, you can learn more about the fusion of Chinese and Portuguese cultures, architectural legacies, and authentic cuisine. Take a stroll through the cobblestone streets and ornately tiled plazas, visit historic architectural gems, and sample the local cuisine.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Is Now A Visa To Macau Required For Indians?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Macau, also known as the "Vegas of China," is a gambling mecca with a thriving nightlife. Indian citizens can enter Macau without a visa for up to 30 days and can also obtain one at the Hong Kong airport.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> How Long Should You Stay In Hong Kong And Macau?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Six days are sufficient to enjoy Hong Kong and Macau's sightseeing and tourist attractions. During your 6-day tour, you can participate in an immersive experience, take a ferry ride, enjoy fun rides at Disneyland, and visit famous tourist attractions in both destinations.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Are Hong Kong's Food Preferences?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Cantonese cuisine, European cuisines particularly British cuisine, and non-Cantonese Chinese cuisines particularly Hakka, Teochew, Hokkien, and Shanghainese, as well as Japanese, Korean, and Southeast Asian cuisines, have influenced Hong Kong cuisine.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Macau's Food Culture Like?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Among the popular dishes are Majie Fish, Portuguese Chicken, Green Vegetable Soup, and Portuguese-Style Custard Tart, among others. Macau is a duty-free zone. Most drinks, including wine, alcohol, champagne, and the famous Portuguese Porto, are sometimes cheaper than in Portugal.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>
